availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Bingley Anderson (Maysville (Mason County) hardware merchant)

body.p: Residence: Maysville, Mason County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born hardware merchant. Married George Ann Gulick.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, Ward 2, p. 54.

Find A Grave, Entry for Charles Bingley Anderson (1824-1897), Find A Grave Memorial # 157574909, Maysville Cemetery, Maysville, Macon County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=157574909&ref=acom (accessed 21 Jul 2017).
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, Ward 4, p. 13.
